segments.text: How do you know ? I thought Taiwanese people didn't have garage sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . We're not really into used stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've grown to like second-hand things . I wouldn't have gotten through university without them !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There aren't many places that sell used things in Taiwan , besides auction websites .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I use those sites . Hey ! Let's go check out a flea market later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I can teach you men a thing or two about shopping !
segments.speaker: S2
